DataElement.preferredDefinition: A category which describes an individual's history of smoking tobacco.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: The history of when and what an individual smoke(s) or smoked._A record of an individual's background in regard to smoking tobacco. This would include such factors as start date, end date (if applicable), number of cigarette smoked, attempts to quit, and others.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: The history of when and what an individual smoke(s) or smoked.

Concepts.definition: The history of when and what an individual smoke(s) or smoked.

Property.preferredDefinition: A record of an individual's background in regard to smoking tobacco.  This would include such factors as start date, end date (if applicable), number of cigarette smoked, attempts to quit, and others.

Concepts.definition: A record of an individual's background in regard to smoking tobacco. This would include such factors as start date, end date (if applicable), number of cigarette smoked, attempts to quit, and others.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Observations and activities relating to behavior, such as smoking and ETOH use.

DataElementConcept.origin: CPTAC: Clinical Proteomic Tumor Analysis Consortium
DataElementConcept.changeDescription: 11/10/19 jk Released per CPTAC SME (Linda) for Medical History CRF.  6-18-19 tt created for CPTAC Medical History CRF.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: A record of an individual's background in regard to smoking tobacco. This would include such factors as start date, end date (if applicable), number of cigarette smoked, attempts to quit, and others._A grouping of items based on some commonality or by user defined characteristics.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: An indication that the smoking history of an individual is unavailable.

Concepts.definition: An indication that the smoking history of an individual is unavailable.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: An individual who stopped smoking an unknown number of years prior.

Concepts.definition: An individual who stopped smoking an unknown number of years prior.

PermissibleValues.value: Current reformed smoker within past 15 years
PermissibleValues.valueDescription: Current Reformed Smoker Within Past 15 Years

ValueMeaning.preferredName: Current Reformed Smoker Within Past 15 Years
ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: An individual who stopped smoking within the past 15 years.

Concepts.longName: Current Reformed Smoker Within Past 15 Years
Concepts.definition: An individual who stopped smoking within the past 15 years.

PermissibleValues.value: Current reformed smoker, more than 15 years
PermissibleValues.valueDescription: Current Reformed Smoker, More than 15 Years

ValueMeaning.preferredName: Current Reformed Smoker, More than 15 Years
ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: An individual who stopped smoking more than 15 years prior.

Concepts.longName: Current Reformed Smoker, More than 15 Years
Concepts.definition: An individual who stopped smoking more than 15 years prior.

PermissibleValues.value: Current smoker: Includes daily and non-daily smokers
PermissibleValues.valueDescription: Current Smoker Includes Daily and Non-daily Smokers

ValueMeaning.preferredName: Current Smoker Includes Daily and Non-daily Smokers
ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: An indication that an individual is a current smoker that may or may not smoke daily.

Concepts.longName: Current Smoker Includes Daily and Non-daily Smokers
Concepts.definition: An indication that an individual is a current smoker that may or may not smoke daily.

PermissibleValues.value: Lifelong non-smoker: Less than 100 cigarettes smoked in lifetime
PermissibleValues.valueDescription: Lifelong non-smoker Less than 100 cigarettes smoked in lifetime

ValueMeaning.preferredName: Lifelong non-smoker Less than 100 cigarettes smoked in lifetime
ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: An individual who has smoked less than 100 cigarettes in their lifetime.

Concepts.longName: Lifelong non-smoker Less than 100 cigarettes smoked in lifetime
Concepts.definition: An individual who has smoked less than 100 cigarettes in their lifetime.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Not known, not observed, not recorded, or refused.

Concepts.definition: Not known, observed, recorded; or reported as unknown by the data contributor.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Observations and activities relating to behavior, such as smoking and ETOH use.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: A record of an individual's background in regard to smoking tobacco. This would include such factors as start date, end date (if applicable), number of cigarette smoked, attempts to quit, and others.:A grouping of items based on some commonality or by user defined characteristics.

Concepts.definition: A record of an individual's background in regard to smoking tobacco. This would include such factors as start date, end date (if applicable), number of cigarette smoked, attempts to quit, and others.
A grouping of items based on some commonality or by user defined characteristics.
